resources.string: \t\t\t-:: Profile ::-\nUse this feature to view your profile details like name, mobile number, address, etc.

\t\t\t-:: Attendance ::-\nIn attendance feature, you can view attendance of employees and vehicles datewise. You can see login and logout details each day your employees and vehicles have used the app for attendance.

\t\t\t-:: Add Employee/Vehicle ::-\nIn this section, you can add new vehicle or employee using his details. The most important detail is the IMEI number, without which it is not possible to login and track the user..

\t\t\t-:: Track Employee/Vehicle ::-\nUsing this feature, you can track the location of employee/vehicle in real time. If the system on client side is not being used, you can see their last location of attendance.
\t\t\t-:: Settings ::-\nIn settings, you can change the font size of the app for easy view of the app items as per your choice.
